data.enText: a person who gives a lecture

data.chText: 她是一个出色的演讲者。
data.enText: She's a superb lecturer.
(especially in Britain) a person who teaches at a university or college

data.chText: 他是牛津大学的法语讲师。
data.enText: He's a lecturer in French at Oxford.

data.chText: 以上各词均指说话者，尤指以某种方式说话的人。
data.enText: These are all words for a person who talks or who is talking, especially in a particular way.
speaker

data.chText: 指发言者、讲某种语言的人、演讲者：
data.enText: a person who is or was speaking; a person who speaks a particular language; a person who makes a speech

data.chText: 我四下环顾看说话的是谁。
data.enText: I looked around to see who the speaker was.

data.chText: 阿拉伯语讲得流利的人
data.enText: a fluent Arabic speaker
the keynote speaker at the conference
lecturer

data.chText: 指讲课者、讲授者、讲演者
data.enText: a person who gives a lecture (= a talk to a group of people to teach them about a particular subject)
communicator
( rather formal ) a person who is able to describe their ideas and feelings clearly to others

data.chText: 理想的候选人定要是善于沟通的人。
data.enText: The ideal candidate will be an effective communicator.
talker

data.chText: 指以某种方式说话的人、爱说话的人：
data.enText: a person who talks in a particular way or who talks a lot

data.chText: 他是一个说话很有说服力的人。
data.enText: He's a very persuasive talker.
She's a (great) talker (= she talks a lot) .

data.chText: talker用以指说话多或少，或者话说得如何的人，不用以指正在或曾经在说话的人：
data.enText: Talker is used when you are talking about how much sb talks or how well they talk. It is not used for the person who is or was talking.
I looked round to see who the talker was.

data.chText: good/persuasive speaker指的是擅长演讲的人。如果指健谈或能言善辩的人就用talker。
data.enText: You can say that sb is a good/persuasive speaker but that means that they are good at making speeches. If you mean that they speak well in conversation, use talker .
speaker or talker?
conversationalist
( rather formal ) a person who is good at talking to others, especially in an informal way
a good speaker/lecturer/communicator/talker/conversationalist
a(n) great/effective/skilful/excellent speaker/communicator
a poor speaker/lecturer/communicator/conversationalist
a public speaker/lecturer
the keynote/main/principal speaker/lecturer

tr: a public lecturer at certain universities

value.def: A lecturer is a teacher at a university or college.

example.ex: ...a lecturer in law at Southampton University.
example.tran: 南安普敦大学的一位法学讲师

trans: 高级讲师；资深讲师；高級講師
